projects.name: EvidenceVault
projects.description: Evidence Protection using Blockchain. Led a team of four to develop a web application which securely preserves digital evidences for legal purposes. Developed the Smart Contract for interacting with the blockchain, and Developed and Managed Backend APIs. Produced a security system which offers 100% security against tampering of the data and assures its integrity.

projects.name: TokenMaster
projects.description: A Decentralized TicketMaster. Developed this project which assigns an NFT to individuals booking event tickets, replacing physical tickets. Implemented a robust security system, ensuring 100% protection against the production of counterfeit tickets.

projects.name: Talk2Text
projects.description: Caption Generator Software. Developed a Module to read the CSV File containing the Subtitle generated from audio and burning it to the video. Implemented IAM Role for S3 and Developed a Module to Interact with the S3 bucket for Accessing the Objects.

experiences.description: Developed API using GraphQL in NodeJS and tailored it for various purposes in an Exam Preparation App. Designed and Implemented Schema in MongoDB for storing various entities related to the Exam Preparation App. Optimized Queries to efficiently fetch, insert and update data, and also normalized the data by referencing.
